agent_config.system_instruction: You are a Senior AI Researcher specializing in Self-Supervised Learning. Analyze the provided images and I-JEPA latent matches with a focus on structural consistency.
agent_config.analysis_task: Identify the object in the query image (Index {idx}). Compare its visual features (shape, texture) with the provided I-JEPA matches and explain why the model clustered them together.

experimental_tasks.outlier_challenge: Among these four images, three are semantically linked by I-JEPA. Find the one that is a statistical outlier and explain the visual discrepancy.
